TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RequestSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage

summary.span: 表示 wst:RequestSecurityToken 項目 (RST)，這用來要求安全性權杖。

span.span: Represents the wst:RequestSecurityToken element (RST), which is used to request a security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wst: requestsecuritytoken 項目 （訊息） 包含的參數和屬性可用來從安全性權杖服務 (STS) 要求安全性權杖。The wst:RequestSecurityToken element (message) contains the parameters and properties used to request a security token from a security token service (STS). 訊息 （或元素） 是為 RST 縮寫。The message (or element) is abbreviated as RST. 類別包含的 RST 元素的屬性。The class contains properties that represent the elements of the RST. RST 以形成對應至任何 Ws-trust; 所定義的要求繫結的要求例如，發佈繫結更新繫結、 驗證繫結或取消繫結。An RST can form a request that corresponds to any of the request bindings defined by WS-Trust; for example, the Issuance binding, the Renewal binding, the Validate binding, or the Cancel binding. 許多屬性在類別對應至只在特定類型的要求這些繫結所定義中出現的項目。Many of the properties in the class correspond to elements that are present only in specific kinds of requests as defined by these bindings. 要求特定的類型而定代表物件或物件的某些屬性可能會出現在特定的要求，它表示參數`null`。Depending on the kind of request a particular object represents or the parameters present in the specific request that it represents, some properties of the object may be `null`. STS 會傳回要求的回應中包含的 wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse 項目 (RSTR) 的訊息。The STS returns a response to the request in a message that contains a wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse element (RSTR). 此訊息由類別。This message is represented by the class. [!INCLUDE[wif_wstrust_ref](~/includes/wif-wstrust-ref-md.md)] ## Examples 使用本主題中的程式碼範例取自`Custom Token`範例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)，並且包括能夠為 SWT 權杖的被動式 STS 實作。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. STS 會由衍生自類別實作。The STS is implemented by a class that is derived from . 方法的許多其權杖發行管線需要從呼叫的類別物件當做其中它們的參數。Many of the methods of the class that are called from its token issuance pipeline take a object as one if their parameters. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例 WIF 以及有關下載這些檔案的位置資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼範例示範 方法的實作。The following code example shows an implementation of the method. 這個方法會接受做為其中一個參數，以及這個參數的屬性用來設定屬性方法所傳回的物件。The method takes a as one of its parameters and properties of this parameter are used to set properties on the object that is returned by the method. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#4)] [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#5)] [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的初始值屬性的特定值的`keyType`參數。The following table shows the initial value of the property for specific values of the `keyType` parameter. |`keyType` 參數`keyType` parameter| 屬性 property| |-------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||10241024| ||00| ||256256| 寄件者通常會使用這個建構函式。This constructor is usually used by the sender.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ ActAs { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要求者嘗試扮演之識別的安全性權杖。

span.span: Gets or sets the security token for the identity that the requestor is attempting to act as.

value.span: 表示要求者嘗試扮演之識別身分的 。

span.span: A that represents the identity the requestor is attempting to act as.
Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst:ActAs 項目的內容。Represents the contents of the wst:ActAs element. 此選擇性項目支援委派案例，並指出要求者正提出要求，以做為其他身分識別。This optional element supports delegation scenarios and indicates that the requestor is making the request to act as another identity. Ws-trust 1.4 中引進這個項目。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 這個屬性是`null`中不包含委派的要求。This property is `null` in requests that don’t involve delegation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::AdditionalContext ^ AdditionalContext { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::AdditionalContext ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::AdditionalContext ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要求的其他內容資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets the additional context information for the request.

value.span: 包含要求之其他內容資訊的 。

span.span: An that contains the additional context information for the request.
Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 auth:AdditionalContext 項目的內容。Represents the contents of the auth:AdditionalContext element. 此選擇性項目會提供安全性權杖服務 (STS) 可以使用在權杖發行過程中的其他資訊。This optional element provides additional information that the security token service (STS) can use in the token issuance process.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ CancelTarget { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要在 WS-Trust 取消要求中取消的權杖。

span.span: Gets or sets the token to be canceled in a WS-Trust cancel request.
A that contains the token to be cancelled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst:CancelTarget 之項目的內容。Represents the contents of a wst:CancelTarget element. 這個項目會有要在 Ws-trust 取消要求取消的語彙基元的相關資訊。This element carries the information about the token to be cancelled in a WS-Trust cancel request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Claims As RequestClaimCollection

summary.span: 取得用戶端 (要求者) 要求的宣告類型。

span.span: Gets the claim types requested by the client (requestor).
A that contains the requested claims.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst:Claims 項目的內容。Represents the contents of the wst:Claims element. 此選擇性項目要求的用戶端要求特定的宣告型別集合。This optional element requests the set of specific claim types requested by the client.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ComputedKeyAlgorithm { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得 URI，表示計算的金鑰用於所發出權杖時使用的所需演算法。

span.span: Gets a URI that represents the desired algorithm to use when computed keys are used for issued tokens.

value.span: 包含表示計算金鑰演算法之 URI 的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the URI that represents the computed key algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst:ComputedKeyAlgorithm 項目。Represents the wst:ComputedKeyAlgorithm element. 此選擇性項目會指定代表計算的金鑰用來發出的權杖時所要使用所需的演算法的 URI。This optional element specifies a URI that represents the desired algorithm to use when computed keys are used for issued tokens.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Delegatable As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Delegatable { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定發出的權杖是否應該標示為可委派。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies if the issued token should be marked as delegatable.

value.span: 如果發出的權杖為可委派，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the issued token is delegatable; otherwise, .
Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表內容的 wst： 只要項目。Represents the contents of the wst:Delegatable element. 此選擇性項目表示的可能只要到另一個合作對象傳回的權杖。This optional element indicates that the returned token may be delegatable to another party. Ws-trust 1.4 中引進這個項目。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 這個屬性用於搭配屬性。This property used in conjunction with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ DelegateTo { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定發出的權杖應該委派到的識別。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity to which the issued token should be delegated.

value.span: 表示所發行權杖應該委派到之識別的 。

span.span: A that represents the identity to which the issued token should be delegated.
Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst:DelegateTo 項目的內容。Represents the contents of the wst:DelegateTo element. 此選擇性項目會指出委派發出的權杖，以指定的身分識別。This optional element indicates that the issued token be delegated to the specified identity. Ws-trust 1.4 中引進這個項目。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 這個屬性是`null`中不包含委派的要求。This property is `null` in requests that don’t involve delegation. 這個屬性用於搭配屬性。This property is used in conjunction with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ Encryption { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定加密時要使用之權杖和金鑰的資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets information on the token and key to use when encrypting.
A that contains the encrypting information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst:Encryption 項目的內容。Represents the contents of the wst:Encryption element. 此選擇性項目表示發出的安全性權杖中傳回的秘密應該要加密的指定語彙基元。This optional element indicates that any returned secrets in issued security tokens should be encrypted for the specified token.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Forwardable As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Forwardable { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定發出的權杖是否應該標示為可轉送。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies if the issued token should be marked forwardable.

value.span: 如果發出的權杖為可轉送，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the issued token is forwardable; otherwise, .
Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表內容的 wst: Forwardable 項目。Represents the contents of the wst:Forwardable element. 此選擇性項目會指出是否傳回的權杖要求者的電腦或服務繫結 (由`false`值)。This optional element indicates whether the returned token is bound to the requestor’s computer or service (indicated by a `false` value). Ws-trust 1.4 中引進這個項目。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 這個屬性用於搭配屬性。This property used in conjunction with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::EndpointReference ^ Issuer { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::EndpointReference ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::EndpointReference ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 wst:OnBehalfOf 權杖的簽發者。

span.span: Gets or sets the issuer of the wst:OnBehalfOf token.
A that contains the address of the issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst:Issuer 項目的內容。Represents the contents of the wst:Issuer element. 此選擇性項目會識別 wst:OnBehalfOf 元素中指定的語彙基元的簽發者。This optional element identifies the issuer of the token that is specified in the wst:OnBehalfOf element.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ OnBehalfOf { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定識別的權杖，代表此識別提出要求。

span.span: Gets or sets the token for the identity on behalf of which the request is being made.

value.span: 包含正在提出要求之識別權杖的 。

span.span: A that contains the token of the identity for which the request is being made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst:OnBehalfOf 項目的內容。Represents the contents of the wst:OnBehalfOf element. 此選擇性項目表示要求器正在進行其他身分識別，代表要求。This optional element indicates that the requestor is making the request on behalf of another identity.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Participants ^ Participants { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Participants ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Participants ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定獲授權使用所發出權杖的參與者。

span.span: Gets or sets the participants that are authorized to use the issued token.

value.span: 包含獲授權使用所發行權杖之參與者的 。

span.span: A that contains the participants that are authorized to use the issued token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst:Participants 項目的內容。Represents the contents of the wst:Participants element. 此選擇性項目會識別已獲授權使用語彙基元的其他參與者。This optional element identifies additional participants that are authorized to use the token.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ ProofEncryption { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來加密證明權杖的權杖。

span.span: Gets or sets the token to be used to encrypt the proof token.
A that contains the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst:ProofEncryption 項目的內容。Represents the contents of the wst:ProofEncryption element. 此選擇性項目包含要用來加密的證明金鑰的語彙基元。This optional element contains the token to be used to encrypt the proof key.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Renewing ^ Renewing { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Renewing ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Renewing ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 WS-Trust 更新要求的更新語意。

span.span: Gets or sets the renew semantics for a WS-Trust renew request.
Returns that contains the renew semantics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表內容的 wst： 正在更新的項目。Represents the contents of the wst:Renewing element. 此選擇性項目指定 Ws-trust 更新要求的更新語意。This optional element specifies the renew semantics for a WS-Trust renew request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ RenewTarget { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要在 WS-Trust 更新要求中更新的權杖。

span.span: Gets or sets the token to be renewed in a WS-Trust renew request.
A that contains the token to be renewed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst: renewtarget 項目的內容。Represents the contents of a wst:RenewTarget element. 這個項目會帶來 Ws-trust 中更新該權杖相關的資訊更新要求。This element carries the information about the token to be renewed in a WS-Trust renew request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::RequestSecurityToken ^ SecondaryParameters { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::RequestSecurityToken ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::RequestSecurityToken ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要求者不是建立者的參數。

span.span: Gets or sets parameters for which the requestor is not the originator.

value.span: 包含要求的第二個參數 (也就是，要求者並非原始寄件者的參數) 的 。

span.span: A that contains secondary parameters for the request; that is, parameters for which the requestor is not the originator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst:SecondaryParameters 之項目的內容。Represents the contents of a wst:SecondaryParameters element. 此選擇性項目包含要求者不的建立者的參數。This optional element contains parameters for which the requestor is not the originator. STS 可能選擇使用這個項目，根據其原則中找到的值。An STS may choose to use the values found in this element based on its policy.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ ValidateTarget { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要在 WS-Trust 驗證要求中驗證的權杖。

span.span: Gets or sets the token to be validated in a WS-Trust validate request.
A that contains the token to be validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 wst:ValidateTarget 之項目的內容。Represents the contents of a wst:ValidateTarget element. 這個項目會帶來 Ws-trust 中驗證該權杖相關的資訊驗證要求。This element carries the information about the token to be validated in a WS-Trust validate request.
